arts.sum: Corinthians come into this battle on the back of two wins on the spin, a run they'll be hoping to extend to three here. Last time out, they ran out 2-1 winners against Vitoria on the road. They curren...

arts.ttl: Preview: Corinthians vs. Cruzeiro - prediction, team news, lineups
arts.sum: Sports Mole previews Wednesday's Brasileiro clash between Corinthians and Cruzeiro, including predictions, team news and possible lineups.
